Synopsis:
The true and inspiring story of surf phenomenon Jay Moriarity (Jonny Weston). When, at the age of 15 years, Jay discovers that the legendary wave called "Mavericks", one of the most massive planet, approaching his home in Santa Cruz, where they will break, get the help of the legendary Frosty Hesson (Gerard Butler) to train him so we can survive this phenomenon. When Jay and Frosty embark on the effort to achieve the impossible, is emerging among them a unique friendship that transforms their lives and their attempt to dominate the Mavericks becomes something beyond surfing.
